title: [Large-Scale] Constructivist-Based Adaptive Language Learning Design: Cognitive Flexibility Training for Administrators

context.additional_context: Implementing a customized constructivist learning environment for corporate managers to improve job-related language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can creatively solve at least three job-related language problems using a constructivist approach.
Learners can design language learning pathways tailored to individual learning patterns with over 70% accuracy using adaptive learning tools.
Learners can flexibly apply and switch between five or more language expression strategies in various situations by applying cognitive flexibility theory.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
